Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransporterRoom
    public class Room
extends Object
    This class is the Room class of the "Queen's Crystals" application, which is based on the "World of Zuul" application by Barnes and Kölling. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. Users can walk around some scenery. That's all. It should really be extended to make it more interesting! A "Room" represents a room in the game. Players can travel from Room to Room. Rooms can hold any number of Items, implemented as an ArrayList. Rooms can optinally contain a single NonPlayerChar.
    Version:
    10/25/2020
    Author:
    Catherine Oldfield For RVCC GDEV242 - Fall 2020 from code written by Michael Kölling and David J. Barnes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room​(String roomName,
            String roomDescription)
        Create a Room named "name". Initially, it has no exits. "name" is something like "kitchen" or "court yard" and "description" is a short description of the room. This version of the room has no NonPlayerChar.
        Parameters:
        roomName - The room's name.
        roomDescription - The room's description.

      • Room

        public Room​(String roomName,
            String roomDescription,
            NonPlayerChar newNPC)
        Create a Room named "name". Initially, it has no exits. name" is something like "kitchen" or "court yard" and "description" is a short description of the room. This version of the room has a NonPlayerChar.
        Parameters:
        roomName - The room's name.
        roomDescription - The room's description.
        newNPC - The NonPlayerChar present in this room.

    • Method Detail

      • setExit

        public void setExit​(String direction,
                    Room neighbor)
        Define an exit from this room.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction of the exit.
        neighbor - The room to which the exit leads.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the name of the room
        Returns:
        name The name of the room

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        Return a description of the room, including its name and the names of any Items or NonPlayerChars that are in the room. Also list the room's exits.
        Returns:
        A description of this room

      • getDetailedDescription

        public String getDetailedDescription()
        Return a description of the room, including its name and the names of any Items or NonPlayerChars that are in the room. If there are any Items or NonPlayerChars, list their descriptions as well. Also list the room's exits.
        Returns:
        A detailed description of this room

      • getExit

        public Room getExit​(String direction)
        Return the room that is reached if we go from this room in direction "direction". If there is no room in that direction, return null.
        Parameters:
        direction - The exit's direction.
        Returns:
        The room in the given direction.

      • addItem

        Add an item to this room.
        Parameters:
        newItem - The item to add.
